turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking that I'd like to order a Hawaiian pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you confirm what's on a Can you confirm what's on a Hawaiian pizza, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, just the one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Some people add onions but a hawaiian is ham and pineapple at bella luna's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm. Okay. Well, I would like to have two medium pizzas that are pineapple and black olive with extra cheese, please. And I'd like two medium pizzas that are just plain extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a white sauce on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, could you repeat that so I can make sure I have that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have two medium pizzas that are pineapple, black olive with white sauce. And two medium pizzas that are in Two medium pizzas that are plain cheese, and I would like extra cheese on all four of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 medium pineapple and black olive pizzas, 2 medium cheese pizzas, all with extra cheese and white sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And did you wan the amore special?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For a dollar extra we include a 2 litre of Bella Cola.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't want that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you confirm that the plain cheese pizzas have tomato sauce on them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh that's my mistake.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get that from your OrderZone?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so it's 2 medium pizzas with white sauce, pineapple and black olive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and 2 cheese pizzas with red sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: also medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and they all have extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order that for me, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your total will be 33 dollars and 50 cent.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And when will those be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They'll be ready in 30 minutes for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a bella day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
